front.title: Stateless Automatic IPv4 over IPv6 Tunneling: Specification

abstract.t: This document specifies Stateless Automatic IPv4 over IPv6 Tunneling (SA46T) base specification. SA46T makes backbone network to IPv6 only. And also, SA46T can stack many IPv4 networks, i.e. the networks using same IPv4 (private) addresses, without interdependence. SA46T is gateway technology, not protocol.
